name: INPersonHandle
desc: The identifying information for a user of your app.

items.name: init(value: String?, type: INPersonHandleType, label: INPersonHandleLabel?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a person handle with the specified data.

items.name: init(value: String?, type: INPersonHandleType)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a person handle with the specified data.

items.name: var type: INPersonHandleType
items.desc: The type of information contained in the handle.

items.desc: A standard label that describes the meaning of the information.

items.name: enum INPersonHandleType
items.desc: Constants indicating the types of data that can be associated with a person handle.
